resources.string: Phones ring into the classroom so please make an effort to call before/after school or during a conference period.

Grand Blanc High School, in partnership with the University of Michigan–Flint, will be opening the Grand Blanc Early College (GBEC) during the 2015–2016 school year. This exclusive opportunity will be available to Grand Blanc High School students entering Junior status in the 2015–2016 school year. Enrollment will begin during the 2014–2015 school year.​

1st Hour: 7:20 – 8:19 (59 minutes) 
2nd Hour: 8:25 - 9:23 (58 minutes) 
3rd Hour: 9:29 - 10:32 (63 minutes with announcements) 

A Lunch: 10:32 - 11:02 (class starts at 11:08) 
B Lunch: 11:05 - 11:35 (class starts at 11:38) 
C Lunch: 11:38 - 12:08 

4th Hour: 10:38 - 12:08 
5th Hour: 12:14 - 1:12 (58 minutes) 
6th Hour: 1:18 - 2:16 (58 minutes) 

***There will be a tone at 8:16, 9:20, 10:29, 12:05 and 1:09 to release travelers to their next class. All non-traveling students must remain in class until the official end of the period.

1st Hour: 7:20 – 7:48 (28 minutes) 
2nd Hour: 7:54 - 8:22 (28 minutes) 
3rd Hour: 8:28 - 9:01 (29 minutes) 

No lunch is served on a half day. 

4th Hour: 9:07 - 9:35 (28 minutes) 
5th Hour: 9:41 - 10:09 (28 minutes) 
6th Hour: 10:15 - 10:43 (28 minutes) 

***There will be a tone at 7:45, 8:19, 8:58, 9:32 and 10:06 to release travelers to their next class. All non-traveling students must remain in class until the official end of the period.

1st Hour: 9:40 – 10:11 (31 minutes) 
2nd Hour: 10:17 - 10:48 (31 minutes) 
3rd Hour: 10:54 - 11:25 (31 minutes) 

A Lunch: 11:25 - 11:55 (class starts at 12:01) 
B Lunch: 11:58 - 12:28 (class starts at 12:31) 
C Lunch: 12:31 - 1:01 

4th Hour: 11:31 - 1:01 (60 minutes of class) 
5th Hour: 1:07 - 1:38 (31 minutes) 
6th Hour: 1:44 - 2:16 (32 minutes) 

***There will be a tone at 10:08, 10:45, 11:22, 12:58 and 1:35 to release travelers to their next class. All non-traveling students must remain in class until the official end of the period.
